headline: A Day of Graphic Detail as Weinstein’s Rape Trial Gets Underway
abstract: A prosecutor offered graphic details, including that Harvey Weinstein showed up uninvited outside Annabella Sciorra’s hotel room in his underwear.
lead_paragraph: In Hollywood, Harvey Weinstein was a man of seemingly infinite power, not only making Oscar-winning films like “Pulp Fiction” and “Shakespeare in Love,” but also helping make careers.
